original_text: But his delight is in the law of the Lord; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.
korean_text: 오직 여호와의 율법을 즐거워하여 그의 율법을 주야로 묵상하는도다

sentences.original_text: But his delight is in the law of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 즐거움은 주의 율법에 있고

sentences.original_text: and in his law doth he meditate day and night
